page.title: 08TRANSPORT - BURGHFIELD
page.content: Quite a few people use cycles. Some people are doing their cycling proficiency badge. There is only one bus service in the area we are working in. Most people have got cars: not many people use public transport. There is a bus stop near the triangle. There are no Garages where you can buy cars in our area. Some people hire minibuses like Burghfield taxis. Bikes are very useful for going around Burghfield. A lot of people have got two cars. Theale railway station is also used a lot for transport because it is the only station in the area. There is also the M4 which leads to South Wales or London.
